[ library(fd_sets) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

intset(?Set, +Min, +Max)

Set is a set containing numbers between Min and Max
Set
A free variable, set variable or an integer list
Min
integer
Max
integer

Description

Unifies Set with a set variable whose lower bound is the empty set and whose upper bound is the set of all integers between Min and Max. Equivalent to Set::[]..[Min,Min+1,..,Max].

Exceptions

(4) instantiation fault
Min or Max are uninstantiated
(5) type error
Set is not a variable or list

See Also

intsets / 4, :: / 2
